name: pkgsign
description: A CLI tool for signing and verifying npm and yarn packages.
author: Redpoint Games

scripts.pkgsign: yarn clean && tsc && yarn normalize && node dist/index.js
scripts.sign: yarn clean && tsc && yarn normalize && node dist/index.js sign .
scripts.verify: yarn clean && tsc && yarn normalize && node dist/index.js verify . --full
scripts.signedpack: yarn clean && tsc && yarn normalize && yarn pack --filename pkgsign.tgz && node dist/index.js sign pkgsign.tgz
scripts.release: yarn test && yarn clean && tsc && yarn normalize && node util/ensure-release.js && yarn pack --filename pkgsign.tgz && node dist/index.js sign pkgsign.tgz && yarn publish pkgsign.tgz
scripts.prerelease: yarn test && yarn clean && tsc && yarn normalize && node util/ensure-prerelease.js && yarn pack --filename pkgsign.tgz && node dist/index.js sign pkgsign.tgz && yarn publish pkgsign.tgz --tag next
